main: Starts battles with 10 {status:Bullet} and 1 {status:Bullet_LogicAtelier}. S1 consumes 3 {status:Bullet}. S2 and S3 consume 1 each.
The first use of his S3 consumes {status:Bullet_LogicAtelier} to convert it into S3-2.

When out of {status:Bullet} and {status:Bullet_LogicAtelier}, retreats at the end of the turn. He {status:FullReload}s when returning (once per encounter), but only reloads {status:Bullet}, not {status:Bullet_LogicAtelier}.

Gets free S2 uses when {identity:10611} is also on the field due to his S2 and S3 effects, passively maintaining his {status:Breath} Count even without the Count from his S1. This makes using his S1 generally not recommended due to how much {status:Bullet} it consumes unless you really need it to prevent him from losing his {status:Breath} stack (in niche circumstances). You can use his defense instead if you have no choice.

His defense skill gives him 1 stack of {status:LogicAtelierAM} and triggers {identity:10611}'s S1-2 if he's also on the field. {status:LogicAtelierAM} stacks up to 4 times and is consumed when using either versions of S3 to increase its damage and generate bonus {status:Breath}. Returning after retreating will also start him off with 4 stacks.
other: S2 is a strong single coin skill that inflicts {status:PenetrateTakeDamageUp}.

S3 is an extremely strong single coin nuke skill. S3-2 is an even stronger version of his S3. Both versions of S3 consume any {status:Breath} Potency above 30 to deal even more damage (up to 10 stacks).

If his passive is active, he gains some {status:Agility} based on his {status:Breath} increasing his S2 and S3's damage (since they get bonus damage based on speed difference). If he did not attack (excluding the bonus S2s from {identity:10611}'s mechanics), he grants 3 {status:Breath} to an ally and 10 {status:Breath} and 1 {status:PenetrateResultUp} to himself.

1071101.desc:
Encounter Start: gain 3 [PenetrateResultUp]

Turn End: If this unit does not have any remaining [Bullet] of any kind, activate [Retreat_FullStop] (once per Encounter)

If this unit is Substituted in, or is rejoining battle after [Retreat_FullStop], gain max [LogicAtelierAM], 3 [PenetrateResultUp], and [FullReload] (except [Bullet_LogicAtelier]; once per Encounter)
1071101.name: Snipe

1071102.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 10 [Breath] on self (max 2)

Turn End: if this unit is not set to use any Attack Skills (including E.G.O Skills, excluding [CoveringFire]), gain 10 [Breath] and 1 [PenetrateResultUp] next turn.
1071102.name: Precision Aim

1071103.desc:
Encounter Start: gain 3 [PenetrateResultUp]

When this unit enters the Encounter, gain 1 [Bullet_LogicAtelier] (once per Encounter)

Turn End: If this unit does not have any remaining [Bullet] of any kind, activate [Retreat_FullStop] (once per Encounter)

If this unit is Substituted in, or is rejoining battle after [Retreat_FullStop], gain max [LogicAtelierAM], 3 [PenetrateResultUp], and [FullReload]
(Except [Bullet_LogicAtelier]; once per Encounter)
1071103.name: Snipe

1071111.desc:
Turn End: gain 1 [Agility] next turn for every 10 [Breath] on self (max 2)

Combat Start: if this unit is not set to use any Attack Skills (including E.G.O Skills), apply 3 [Breath] to 1 ally with the least [Breath] Potency

Turn End: if this unit did not use any Attack Skills (including E.G.O Skills, excluding [CoveringFire]), gain 10 [Breath] and 1 [PenetrateResultUp] next turn
1071111.name: Precision Aim

1071121.desc:
1 ally with the least [Bullet] gains +2 [Breath] Count when using a Skill that consumes [Bullet].
- If the said ally is a Full-Stop Office Identity, or if they have less than 5 [Breath] Count, gain +4 [Breath] Count instead (once per turn; does not apply to units without [Bullet])
1071121.name: Spotter
